BASIC_ONSTART_TOOLTIP: Run code when the program starts
BASIC_FOREVER_TOOLTIP: Run code repeatedly in the background
BASIC_PAUSE_TOOLTIP: Pause execution for the specified time in milliseconds
BASIC_CONSOLE_LOG_TOOLTIP: Log a value to the console
BASIC_SLEEP_TOOLTIP: Pause execution for the specified time in milliseconds
BASIC_SET_INTERVAL_MESSAGE0:
set interval name $[CONSTRUCTED_VAR_NAME]
 do $[CODE] every $[TIME] ms
BASIC_SET_INTERVAL_TOOLTIP: Set a repeating interval to run code every specified time in milliseconds
BASIC_CLEAR_INTERVAL_TOOLTIP: Clear the specified interval to stop it from running further
BASIC_SET_TIMEOUT_MESSAGE0:
set timeout name $[CONSTRUCTED_VAR_NAME]
 do $[CODE] after $[TIME] ms
BASIC_SET_TIMEOUT_TOOLTIP: Set a timeout to run code after the specified time in milliseconds
BASIC_CLEAR_TIMEOUT_TOOLTIP: Clear the specified timeout to stop it from running further
BASIC_PROMISE_ALL_TOOLTIP: Promise all tasks and wait for all of them to complete
BASIC_PROMISE_ALL_CONTAINER_TOOLTIP: Add, remove, or reorder task slots
